title: Project A
description: Developed a university website. Features student registration, course enrollment, user log-in and log-out functionality, with HTML, CSS, and more.

title: Project B
description: Designed a dedicated mobile app for a public art museum to advertise events, enable patrons to plan visits, and make ticket reservations.

title: Project C
description: Full-stack weather app. Features Open Weather API, providing real-time updates on any location around the world, and search city by name.
